Reviews.Title: Great system with a good manual
Reviews.Author: DrewNY001 "AmMe"

Reviews.Title: Great security system-good images and recording- All-weather good
Reviews.Author: GraceT "GraceT"

ProductInfo.Features:
High quality video cameras with state-of-the-art 420 TV line CCD resolution
State-of-the-art night vision captures high-image clarity up to 65 feet (20m) away
Cutting-edge H.264 recording technology means less storage needed and higher image quality
Lets you "set and forget" by recording continuously from all 4 cameras for over 30 days
Equipped with remote viewing software to stream over the web remotely
H.264 8-Channel Dvr & 4 Ccd Weather-Resistant Cameras
420 Tv Lines Ccd Resolution
65-Ft Night Vision
ProductInfo.Name: Swann Alpha D03C5 SWA43-D3C5 8 Channel H.264 DVR and 4 CCD Weather Resistant Cameras
